LibraryScanning.Description: Automatically scans configured folders for new EPUB files and imports them to the library. You can manually add folders through the UI settings.

DatabaseMaintenance.Description: Performs routine database maintenance including vacuuming, cleaning orphaned records, and removing old temporary files.

CoverImageCache.Description: Pre-generates and caches book cover thumbnails in various sizes for improved UI performance.

LoggingStatistics.Description: Periodically indexes logs and caches error statistics for dashboard display and error search functionality.

ReadingSessionTracking.Description: Automatically tracks active reading sessions and updates reading history. Runs every 30 seconds (hardcoded in worker).

FileStorage.Description: File storage paths for books, temporary files, and cached data. Paths are relative to application data directory.

Application.Name: EpubReader
Application.Description: General application settings. Set EnableBackgroundWorkers to false to disable all background workers.
